reviewText: If you love football, buy this DVD! It is very well written and gives you not only a family generational history of the sport, but also gives you many interesting facts about football starting in high school, continuing to college and on to the professional level. Watching  the Book of Manning is a gift you give to yourself if you love football! My recommendation: buy it, buy it, buy it!
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning

reviewText: Best produced documentary. period.  It has the family from beginning to present.  Sad, happy, all emotions make it a gripping watch.
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning

reviewText: Great documentary about football's first family. Loved the home video and high school footage I had never seen before along with the coverage of the 'other' Manning brother that never gets talked about.I wish it would have been longer and I can't wait for the future SEC films.
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning

reviewText: This DVD is great, it's all about the Manning family and their careers in Football. Starting with the father, Archie to all three sons.Peyton has been "my quarterback since he join the Indy Colts and now with the Denver Broncos", he is the best in my book.This DVD makes you aware of how the family has always been so close.
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning

reviewText: We viewed this on a television special & really enjoyed it.  It is a wonderful story of this endearing family & we were so glad to be able to see it again & share it with others.  It's good to be able to have insights into the real lives of this extraordinary talented & devoted family.  I even enjoy watching them play football more now. :)
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning

reviewText: I bought this as a Christmas present for my Dad.  He hasn't seen it yet, but I have and it is EXTREMELY well done & I enjoyed it IMMENSELY.
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning

reviewText: My love for the Mannings all started with the family patriach Archie Manning in 1969. He was a great quarterback who had the talent but unfortunately played for below 500 teams throughout his NFL career. I always thought that was so unfair to Archie.But his football prowess was passed on to his two sons, Peyton & Eli, who have 3 Super Bowl MVPs & 3 Super Bowl rings between them. Peyton Manning has accumulated NFL records that are untouchable for years to come & is 2nd all time in total yards, pass attempts & pass completions. Eli himself has blossomed from being Peyton's younger brother to a 2 time Super Bowl winner & one of the NFLs most elite quarterbacks. And to think it all started with papa Archie Manning. If all this information doesnot varify or solidify proof that The Mannings are the greatest football family of all time, then those who question or doubt these facts must be living in a parelllel universe.
Title: ESPN: The Book of Manning
